name: SpawnPlayer
notes: Kills the player if they are in a vehicle and then they spawn with a bottle in their hand.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to spawn.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player is not connected.
related_fn:
SetSpawnInfo: Set the spawn setting for a player.
 AddPlayerClass: Add a class.
 OnPlayerSpawn: Called when a player spawns.
related_cb: OnPlayerSpawn: Called when a player spawns.
